Description: Fragment of a bowl: A triangular fragment of a bowl. Moulded with rounded rim. Transparent rose-red glass.
Curator's comments: This triangular fragment of a bowl is of the same fabric as 1885,1101.527 though of less fine quality. The discovery of these two fragments at widely separated points in Egypt supports an Egyptian origin. An Alexandrian origin is probable for both bowls.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
